name: Bogatyr (itch)
description:
You are a literate peasant living in Northern Ruthenia when some idiot wizard blows up your house- how lame! Now it's up to you to show that wizard the what-for and avenge your home!

Bogatyr is interactive fiction in the vein of Zork and Colossal Cave Adventure loosely inspired by the Bylinas and the Tales of King Arthur.

The game uses only a player's keyboard, through the MOVE, USE, INTERACT, and LOOK commands- If you ever forget what you can do, just type "HELP" and press enter!

If your game suddenly closes, that means you found a bug! Submit a bug report here and I'll get to trying to fix it soon! Thank you!
